title: shared subfolders redirect to index.php/
body:
### expected behaviour
clicking on a folder inside /shared should show the contents of that folder

### actual behaviour
we are getting 302 redirects to /index.php instead - this can not be reproduced for all users, just for the shares of one individual that used to work 2 hours ago.

clicking on the 'download' button gives a page saying 'cloud not found'. - as if the folder is not shared at all.

### steps to reproduce
1. log in
2. click on shared
3. click on banners (a shared folder)

### server configuration
operating system:
rhel 6

web server: 
apache 2.2.15

database: mysql 5.5.x

php version: 5.3.3

owncloud version: 5.0.9

### client configuration
browser:
firefox

operating system:
apple os x snow leopard

### logs
#### web server error log
```
[tue aug 06 08:49:13 2013] [notice] selinux policy enabled; httpd running as context system_u:system_r:httpd_t:s0
[tue aug 06 08:49:13 2013] [notice] suexec mechanism enabled (wrapper: /usr/sbin/suexec)
[tue aug 06 08:49:13 2013] [notice] digest: generating secret for digest authentication ...
[tue aug 06 08:49:13 2013] [notice] digest: done
[tue aug 06 08:49:13 2013] [notice] apache/2.2.15 (unix) dav/2 php/5.3.3 configured -- resuming normal operations
[tue aug 06 13:20:55 2013] [error] [client 193.190.191.242] file does not exist: /var/www/html/favicon.ico
```

#### web server access log
```
131.176.105.6 - - [06/aug/2013:14:10:27 +0200] "get /index.php/apps/files?dir=/shared/banners http/1.1" 302 - "https://www.example.com/index.php/apps/files?dir=//shared" "mozilla/5.0 (macintosh; intel mac os x 10.8; rv:22.0) gecko/20100101 firefox/22.0"
```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
<snip... more of the same>
{"app":"core","message":"adding user backend instance of oca\\user_ldap\\user_ldap.","level":0,"time":1375792048}
{"app":"core","message":"adding user backend instance of oc_user_database.","level":0,"time":1375792063}
{"app":"core","message":"adding user backend instance of oca\\user_ldap\\user_ldap.","level":0,"time":1375792063}
```
